test.input: hog, call contact with Drinkwater Lake just to your north

test.name: alternate-look-3
test.input: look one unit south
test.output: Jackknife, you didn't give me a unit of measure.

test.name: alternate-look-4
test.input: hog, lets establish the east-west extent of the lake as a unit of measurement

test.name: alternate-look-5
test.input: look one unit south
test.output: Jackknife, you didn't give me an anchor point.

test.name: alternate-look-6
test.input: hog, let's also establish the southern edge of the lake as our anchor point

test.name: alternate-look-7
test.input: You should see a dirtball road

test.name: alternate-look-8
test.input: look one unit south

test.name: alternate-look-9
test.input: go one unit east, and then one unit north

test.name: alternate-look-10
test.input: look one unit west

test.name: alternate-look-11
test.input: You should see a dirtball road
